review: Fire TV is fabulous. It has essentially any movie you would want for purchase or rent available. I'm not giving it 5 stars because with my Prime Membership, I wish it has more movies available for free viewing.
author: John J. Cahill

review: I bought the Fire TV initially to try and take advantage of more of my Prime account benefits. I finally have a nice and extremely fast way to access all the Movie, TV and Music content besides my Kindle tablet. What I ended up with is far beyond that. The Fire TV has amazing specs which make it one of the fastest units to load a generic media player app on. I ended up side-loading Kodi onto mine and am just amazed with the device now. Sure I use it for Prime content but it's nice to be able to play the backups I've made of my DVD library right off my computer too. Amazon, please don't change a THING! Well.. if you are please make Kodi an approved app to be installed a listed with the rest of the apps. Having to go custom start it from the settings menu gets kind of old.
author: JoshF
